article.title: Transource Services Supplies Ruggedized Laptops
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Transource Services Corporation, Phoenix, Arizona, was awarded an $11,578,820 firm-fixed-price contract for the modification of an existing contract to procure ruggedized laptop computers and removable hard disk drives.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
